title: "Nearmap Expands U.S. Aerial Imagery Coverage 75 Percent"
excerpt: "The company, which captures photos of the ground by plane two or three times a year, now offers imagery for about 80 percent of the U.S. population. Government officials use the photos for a variety of purposes."
